summary: Dunmer around Skyrim will now wear clothes added in the Dragonborn DLC.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]{This is the first mod I have uploaded here. Your feedback would be appreciated.}[/b][/center]
[b] [/b]
This mod was made by me when I realized that the Dark Elves in Skyrim were lacking something. I was just
recently playing Morrowind ([i]again[/i])when I had an idea. Why not make people just a little bit nostalgic by making
the Dunmer in Skyrim wear clothes added by the Dragonborn DLC. It isn’t
perfectly like Morrowind, but it manages to make me a bit nostalgic, so I decided
to upload it here for everybody to download.

[center][b]FEATURES:[/b][/center]

-Most named Dunmer commoners on mainland Skyrim will now be wearing clothes
added by the Dragonborn DLC. I tried not to edit any mages or whatnot, so you
will not find Temple Robes on random Necromancers and such.

-One Dunmer Ghost will now be wearing Bonemold Armor [i](hint: do the quest No Stone Unturned)[/i]. I read the wiki page and itsaid she was an ambushed caravan refugee from Morrowind. I thought it would be
fitting for her to have Boenmold Armor.  
[b]
[/b][center][b]INSTALLATION:[/b]
Use the NMM, or extract the ESP into your Skyrim/Data folder and
check it in the Data Files section of the launcher.[/center]

[center][b]COMPATIBILITY:[/b][/center]

This mod is fully compatible with most other mods. It only edits the clothing
of the NPCs. I have tried it with [i]DLC Integration[/i][i] by [b]Dillonn241[/b][/i][b] and [/b][i]Dunmerized Gray Quarter[/i][i] by [b]MCR[/b][/i]. These mods seemed to work as intended. The merchants willstill sell items from the respective DLCs. I loaded it after both of these mods
just to be safe and I would suggest you load it after these as well. You don’t
have to download these mods, but it certainly helps make the Dark Elves seem
more like they were from Morrowind.

[center][b]CHANGELOG:
[/b][/center][center]Version 1.0:
-Initial Release.[/center]

[b]CREDITS:[/b]
[b]-[/b][b]Dillonn241for making the mod DLC Integration[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82106/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82106/[/url]?
-MCR formaking the mod Dunmerized Gray Quarter
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33119/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33119/[/url]?
- Bethesda Game Studios, for making a great game and DLC. They made the tools necessary to make this mod.
author: Skeleton212
